title: Arlington House, The Robert  E. Lee Memorial: Park Home
body: The Robert E. Lee Memorial  The Robert E. Lee Memorial honors Lee's military and public leadership in pre- and post-Civil War America. Congress designated the memorial to recognize that "the desire and hope of Robert E. Lee for peace and unity within our Nation has come to pass." From the portico you can contemplate our nation's fate as you gaze across the river that once divided us.Â                  Virtual Tour    Learn about the Robert E. Lee Memorial with our virtual tour.         Arlington House and Site Rehabilitation   The National Park Service is proposing to undertake the rehabilitation of Arlington House, The Robert E. Lee Memorial.
